mapper.select: SELECT c.CURRICULUM_ID as curriculumId, c.CURRICULUM_YEAR as curriculumYear, clw.LECTURE_WEEK as lectureWeek, clw.START_DATE as startDate, clw.END_DATE as endDate, clw.MAKEUP_WEEK as makeupWeek, clw.WEEK_ID as weekId, c.CURRICULUM_NAME as curriculumName FROM curriculum c JOIN curriculum_lecture_week clw on c.CURRICULUM_ID = clw.CURRICULUM_ID ORDER BY c.CURRICULUM_ID, clw.LECTURE_WEEK
